metadata.description: And/or Labs - Tools for B2B SaaS marketing and positioning analysis

plugins.name: positioning-diagnostic
plugins.description: Comprehensive B2B SaaS homepage positioning analysis using proven frameworks from April Dunford, Anthony Pierri (Fletch PMM), Geoffrey Moore, and Al Ries & Jack Trout. Includes 6 commands: /diagnose (quick 60s diagnostic with MECLABS score), /audit (100-point analysis), /alignment (stakeholder testing), /antipatterns (mistake detection), /compare (competitive analysis), and /export (shareable reports).
